normalized: a world of spirits exists between ours and the world of darkness.
protected by the ruling class, the diviners would harness its powersever since ancient times.
but in this age of science and individualism, would it truly surpriseanyone if some rogue diviner would abuse their power?
because normal humans cannot deal with them, japanese governmentdecided to fight fire with fire.
to combat evil, the 'onmyo (diviner) agency' was established.
the 'righteous' diviners would hunt down the 'criminals'.
such people became known as 'diviner knights'…
a thick fog appeared at midnight, swallowing up the neon signs of a10 million large city and spreading ever further.
located in the western part of town, the kujou district degraded intoa slum in the second half of 20th century.
throughout the day, armed refugees and terrorists have free reign here,plotting, whispering, poisoning the city from the inside.
but on a bad day like this one, you wouldn't find even a single dealeron the streets.
it is like everyone is scared of this white darkness, as if waitingfor 'something' lurking in the fog to pass.
everyone, but one person.
that person is a lone woman.
her eyes are the colour of cyan.
in this white darkness, her blonde hair doesn't lose its shine.
even her limbs are well proportioned.
one could even call her beautiful.
could, if not for the dangerous atmosphere surrounding her.
the person walks silently on her black high heels, like a leopard onthe prowl.
there's not a trace of concern on her face.
when suddenly…
…a black shadow emerges from the white darkness, pushing it asidelike condensed milk.
its appearance is clearly grotesque.
the lurking evil reaches out towards the woman with its manytentacles.

name: beauty
normalized: heh…
she only chuckles.
in that moment when an impure hand attempts to touch her body,some kind of barrier stops it in its tracks.

name: beauty
normalized: seriously, only an idiot would summon such a low-level spirit.
her red lips move, the calm voice resounding in the white darkness.
the girl abruptly raises her right hand.
a piece of paper with scribbles on it mysteriously appears between heroutstretched index- and middle fingers.
the complex marks and sigil on the paper are the 'catalyst' used bythe diviners.
in other words, this beauty is one of the diviners.
the 'catalyst' gently separates from her fingers.
although there is no wind, the paper dances in the air as if ridinga breeze.
the girl's pupils light up.

name: beauty
normalized: "blaze arrow"!
the paper acts like a true catalyst to invoke a 'summoning spell' andsuddenly bursts into flames.
mystic flames.
flaming arrows scatter towards the shapes in the fog and the evil oneswriggle and disperse as the spell purifies them.
that was one of the five basic techniques taught to the diviners,called "art of fire".
however, the evil spirits haven't disappeared completely.
on the contrary, a countless number of lesser entities swarms to thesite, like rats scurry to the smell of cheese.

name: beauty
normalized: if i don't take care of you guys, i won't reach the mastermind anytime soon.
as she says it, the girl leaps into the mob of lesser spirits withouteven batting an eye.
in the white darkness, mystic flames blaze up one after another.

name: beauty
normalized: so this is my goal, huh?
having dealt with the weak summons, the girl finally arrives to anantique, abandoned church in the slums.
it's like the building is hiding itself among the crumblingsurroundings.
although the church managed to retain its form, it looks abandonedlike the garden around it.
the white fog enveloping the building is getting denser and denser.
and yet there are no signs of lowly apparations nearby, as if thechurch stands in the eye of the storm.
it is not like the evil spirits fear this place of worship.
it's the opposite.
there is something far scarier, far more evil inside.
the source of this nightmare.

name: beauty
normalized: it's been a while since i last went to church.
she says with an ironic smile.
even though she already rooted out countless spirits, the girl doesn'tlook even slightly fatigued.
on the contrary, the battles with such 'small fry' only added to herdangerous beauty.
and at that moment…
*scree!
with a harsh sound of rusted metal rubbing against metal, the church'slarge, ornate door opens on its own.
as if awaiting her arrival…
it is impossible to see anything on the inside.
there is only densedarkness.

name: beauty
normalized: they sure act cocky, welcoming me in such manner.
without hesitation, the girl enters the darkness of the church.
the interior reeks of blood.
between the old, wooden benches, past the dirty red carpet, there isan altar.
it's giving off a bad vibe.
it is also the source of this stench.
dark red blood is leaking from a mass of flesh laying there.
a pile of entrails is offered at the altar.
human entrails.

name: beauty
normalized: how unsightly.
she mutters, her cold voice drifting through the blood-stained church.

name: woman
normalized: oh my!
and i was trying to add a little personal touch to this place.
is it not to your liking?
in response to her remark, a voice of a woman is heard from thedarkness.
a door to the left of the altar opens.
a woman with suspiciously red lips appears, looking out of place inthis church.

name: beauty
normalized: are you the moron who summoned all these lowly spirits?
she asks, looking at the woman.

name: woman
normalized: yes.
she nods.

name: beauty
normalized: then you must be yuyami?

name: yuyami
normalized: yes, that is correct♪
was i found out already?
the woman called yuyami nods again, her wet mouth smiling in obviousridicule.

name: beauty
normalized: yeah, i've got good intuition.
the girl smiles as well.
her expression is like a panther showing off her fangs.

name: yuyami
normalized: hehehe.
you're interesting.
i'd love to play with you.
yuyami licks her lips, her tongue moving like a snake.

name: beauty
normalized: …allow me to read you your rights.
yuyami, by the order of 'onmyo agency', you are to be terminated.
suppressed rage- no, killing intent is sparkling in her eyes.

name: yuyami
normalized: ahahaha!
i hear these words all the time.
yuyami's pupils look like a reptile's, that is eyeing its prey.

name: beauty
normalized: before i kill you, there are two things i want to ask you.

name: yuyami
normalized: yees?

name: towako
normalized: are those entrails…?
the girl asks without taking her eyes off yuyami.

name: yuyami
normalized: hehehe.
the woman chuckles.

name: yuyami
normalized: it is just as you thought.
these are your comrades who came toeradicate me.
government's lapdogs.

name: beauty
normalized: one last question…are you familiar with yuko sakura?
the girl's expression stiffens slightly at the mention of this name.

name: yuyami
normalized: maybe.
is she a diviner as well?
yuyami shrugs.

name: yuyami
normalized: yuko?
…ah, right!
there was a sow with this name several daysago.

name: yuyami
normalized: i pulled out her intestines through her ass while she was stillalive.
her cries and squeals were so exciting!
mm, you know what i'm talking about?
yuyami thrusts her hand into the pile of organs and pulls out anintestine.

name: yuyami
normalized: do you want it?
that sow's shit pipe?

name: beauty
normalized: now i really have no reason to keep you alive anymore!

name: yuyami
normalized: then, bring it on!
the murderous intent of two women collides.
they jump away to gain some distance.
in their hands- a paper doll.
while they may look the same, the sigils differ.
these are theirpersonal crests.
the women toss them at each other, and shout-

name: beauty
normalized: dog spirit 'vanargandr'!

name: yuyami
normalized: snake spirit 'jormungandr'!
by uttering the words of a summoning spell, they pull an alien entityinto this world.
through the paper doll, the spirits can take shape and do thesummoner's bidding.
they merge with a diviner in body and soul, essentially becoming onebeing.
once the spell is complete, the spirits immediately materialize.
the dog spirit 'vanargandr' appears as a girl clad in tough armour.
scaly skin, long tail and a visage like a cobra, such is the appearanceof serpent spirit 'jormungandr'.
two weird looking warriors were called to the house of god by thediviners' summoning technique.

name: yuyami
normalized: oho!
nice doggy!

name: beauty
normalized: and that ugly snake sure suits you well enough!

name: yuyami
normalized: why, thank you.
i could make you even prettier…by ripping off yourlimbs.

name: beauty
normalized: you took the words out of my mouth!

name: yuyami
normalized: oh really, silly?

name: beauty
normalized: you!
die, dammit!

name: beauty
normalized: 'vanargandr'!

name: yuyami
normalized: 'jormungandr'!
two women and two strange creatures move at the same time.
'vanargandr's' right fist moves with tremendous speed.
'jormungandr' attacks it head-on and the two fists collide.
*wham!
there was only a sound of fleshy impact.
no iron hitting iron, nootherworldly roars.
the impact blasts away the white mist swirling around both women andalso…
*slice!
there is a splash of blood.
the clash of the spirits tears the fabric of reality, cutting thewhite skin of both ladies.

name: beauty
normalized: huh, not bad.
the girl smiles fearlessly.

name: yuyami
normalized: it's just as strong as my 'jormungandr'?!
on the other hand, yuyami is clearly taken by surprise.
she probably expected to defeat the girl in a single strike.

name: beauty
normalized: why are you acting so surprised?
that was just a light jab!
'vanargandr' raises its fist again.
just like the girl said, a fast punch tears through the air into theenemy.
*ratatata!

name: yuyami
normalized: geh?!
although yuyami tries to fight back with 'jormungandr', she isclearly outmatched.
the snake spirit is blown aside by the shockwave.

name: yuyami
normalized: n-no way?!
it's power is greater than my 'jormungandr's'?!
yuyami's surprise knows no bounds.

name: beauty
normalized: feh!
you call that power?
the girl is smiling from ear to ear.

name: yuyami
normalized: wha-?!

name: beauty
normalized: there's still more!
"beast mode"!
the girl shouts another summoning spell.

name: dog spirit vanargandr
normalized: *howl!
the spirit roars.
it's mouth opens wide and fangs start to grow from it.
the bones andsinew on its body swell, as if about to burst.
the dauntless female soldier disappears, changing into a demonic wolffrom ancient legends.
truly the appearance befitting a bloodthirsty demon.

name: yuyami
normalized: 'jormungandr', back off?!
yuyami also pulls back, controlling her patron with her body.

name: beauty
normalized: too slow!

name: towako
normalized: let's do this!
"final blow"!
in response to the girl's shout, the spirit swings its fist.

name: yuyami
normalized: *gasp!
yuyami assumes a defensive posture-
-only to see her snake spirit disappear from her view in the nextmoment.
and…
*smack!

name: yuyami
normalized: n-no way…?!
…only now does she notice vanargandr's fist lodged in the stomach ofher snake spirit.

name: yuyami
normalized: guh!
blood sprouts from yuyami's mouth.
a hole appears in her stomach inthe exact same spot, as the wound of her patron.

name: beauty
normalized: keep your shit to yourself!

name: yuyami
normalized: gah!
as if purposefully delayed by the girl, a shockwave blows away yuyamiand her summoned spirit.
she is lifted off the ground and tossed on the church's floor.

name: yuyami
normalized: gh…ah!
dark red blood flows out on the floor from the convulsing woman.
no matter how you look at it, this wound is fatal.

name: yuyami
normalized: the…diviner who controls a dog spirit…i…know you…
yuyami, still vomiting blood, lifts her upper body to look at thegirl.

name: yuyami
normalized: you're not from 'onmyo agency'.
a mercenary…then, the divinerknight of the dog spirit…you must be…towako yagyu?!

name: beauty
normalized: oh yeah, i still haven't introduced myself.

name: towako
normalized: nice to meetcha.
i'm towako yagyu…well, see ya.
before yuyami could notice it, towako was already armed with a machinegun.

name: yuyami
normalized: ho-hold on…?!

name: towako
normalized: miss sakura was my precious senior.

name: yuyami
normalized: ah…
there's fear in yuyami's blood-stained eyes.
towako looks down on hercoldly and casually pulls the trigger.
*ratatatata!
compared to vanargandr's roar, the hail of bullets sounds almost cute.
but after firing over 20 bullets within seconds, yuyami's head burstslike a crushed watermelon.
the empty shells fall on the floor, scorching the carpet.

name: towako
normalized: mission complete…
towako glances at the altar.
only entrails remain of her senior.
she couldn't help her…
she should leave the cleanup to the 'onmyo agency'.

name: towako
normalized: …tch.
clicking her tongue, towako turns to leave the unpleasant site.
but as soon as she turns her back to yuyami's headless corpse-
-she feels something hot in her back.

name: towako
normalized: what…?!
towako lunges forward, her body moving on instinct.

name: towako
normalized: dog spirit 'vanargandr'!
after rolling over the floor, the girl calls her patron while standingup.
'jormungandr', whom she thought defeated just now, was slowlyapproaching.

name: towako
normalized: geh!
'vanargandr' blocks the snake spirit's attack, but gets flicked away.
the dog spirit collapses, leaving a gap in its defences.
the next punch is aimed at towako.
*slap!
it was supposed to tear up the girl's body-
-but she stopped the spirit's strike with her own hands.

name: yuyami
normalized: ooh, impressive!
the voice came from yuyami's corpse and towako looks in its direction.

name: towako
normalized: my patron's ability is power.
it allows me to fight spirits on equalfooting.

name: yuyami
normalized: i see.
quite splendid, miss diviner knight.
yuyami's corpse gets up, still missing its head.

name: yuyami
normalized: trading blows, guarding and avoiding mortal wounds…ah, how nice it must feel to be young!
where is the voice coming from?
the flesh near the corpse's stomach is wriggling, rapidly closing upthe hole.
even the head that was blasted off by gunfire is beginning toregenerate.
this is obviously an inhuman feat.

name: towako
normalized: you are quite the freak show yourself.
towako takes out a 'catalyst' inscribed with a defensive"art of water"-spell and slaps it on her back to stop the bleeding.

name: yuyami
normalized: hehehe.
still running your mouth?
aren't your wounds worse than youthink?

name: towako
normalized: and you shouldn't even be talking.
towako retorts, but the wound on her back isn't shallow at all.
it'll take some time before her mobility is restored.

name: yuyami
normalized: my beautiful body sure is in a sorry state.
well done.
yuyami says as her face is restoring, pieces of shattered skullgradually re-combining on her neck where it used to be.
the brain tissue climbs up her body to fill the restored skull.
no average human would endure watching such a spectacle.

name: towako
normalized: you hag…what sorcery is this?!
towako spits out, disgust clearly visible on her face.

name: yuyami
normalized: how rude!
i am but a human.
this is my patron's ability:regeneration.
in such a short amount of time, more than half of yuyami's face wasreconstructed.
the hole in her stomach was already sealed off.

name: yuyami
normalized: and you were so confident in your power and your patron's ability.
it must be quite a shocking turn of events.
yuyami picks up her eyeballs and fits them back into her eye sockets.
first the right one, then the left.
soon the regeneration accelerates, instantly rebuilding missing parts.

name: yuyami
normalized: hehe.
it's been a while since we spoke face to face.
she smiles with a renewed look.
an alien smile.

name: towako
normalized: is that immortality?!

name: yuyami
normalized: unfortunately, no.
i'll die if my heart gets crushed…probably.
the woman tells something unbelievable.
at the same time, yuyami casually lifts off picked up by'jormungandr'.

name: towako
normalized: hold it right there!
if you won't die right away, i'll just keepkilling you as long as it takes!

name: yuyami
normalized: alas, it is time for me to leave.

name: towako
normalized: what the-?!
suddenly there is a loud sound-
-and the place bursts into flames.
the fire instantly spreads through the antique church.

name: towako
normalized: why you, hag!

name: yuyami
normalized: it was my loss today.
i look forward to a rematch.
yuyami orders her snake spirit to shatter the glass window anddisappears in the fog outside.

name: towako
normalized: geh!
with the flames blocking her path, towako cannot give chase.
blood is dripping from the wound on her back.

name: yuyami
normalized: i'll be sure to show you hell next time, towako!

name: yuyami
normalized: ahahahaha!
yuyami's crazed laughter echoes through the burning church.

name: towako
normalized: that damn shitty old hag!

name: towako
normalized: i'll kill you!
i'll fucking kill you!
i'll chop you into such tinybits, that you won't be able to regenerate!
she screams furiously, swearing to have her vengeance.

name: dog spirit vanargandr
normalized: *roaarr!
the dog spirit takes on the form of an asura and slams its fists oneafter another into the church's wall.

name: towako
normalized: uaa!
towako too drives her own fists into the wall with the speed of amachine gun, crushing the thing that is blocking her path.
*crash!
with a loud noise, the building's wall is blown to smithereens.
towako and her spirit emerge from the raging flames.
diviner knight towako…
